2577B2B4.Mod1_Description: If {c_important}Chain Lightning{/c} bounces off of you, its next hit deals {c_number}[{SF_13} * 100|%x|]{/c} increased damage.

74D6BC35.Mod2_Description: When {c_important}Chain Lightning{/c} Critically Strikes, it has a {c_number}[{SF_11} * 100|%|]{/c} chance to form a {c_important}{u}Crackling Energy{/u}{/c}.

D618A933.Mod0_Description: {c_important}Chain Lightning{/c} gains a {c_number}[{SF_9} * 100|%+|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Chance per bounce.
